pr_title: [IOTDB-655] Update documents of new version TsFile

timeline.bodyText:
In the table of ChunkHeader, we should remove the row of Max Tombstone Time.
In the table of PageHeader, we need to change the order of last two rows.
timeline.author: HTHou

timeline.bodyText:
I'm thinking if we need to change v0.9 to v0.9/000001, because we write 000001 at the head of the v0.9 TsFile and 000002 the in v0.10 TsFile.
How do you feel?
timeline.author: HTHou
